title.rendered: “Major General Yaron Finkelman Praises Successful Operation at Nasser Hospital: Dozens of Terrorists Captured”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The commander of the Southern Command, Major General Yaron Finkelman, to the soldiers in Khan Yunis: “The operation in the heart of the city at the Nasser Hospital helped us capture dozens of terrorists”

The commander of the Southern Command, Major General Yaron Finkelman, held a situation assessment at the Nasser Hospital in Khan Yunis: “The operation here inside the city of Khan Yunis, in the heart of the city at Nasser Hospital, is very significant. A precise, high-quality, targeted operation that has so far helped us capture dozens of terrorists, including murderous terrorists inside the hospital. We will continue, operate and fight everywhere, also here in the city of Khan Yunis, in the heart of the city, and everywhere in the Gaza Strip. You are doing an excellent job, keep up the good work, I am proud of you. Good luck.”

Attached is footage of the commander of the Southern Command, Major General Yaron Finkelman, in Khan Yunis: https://bit.ly/3SEjqLj.
